description: This file defines a data transfer object (DTO) named BookingCreateRequest used for creating a booking in the airport facility service platform. It is a record class containing various fields related to a booking, with validation and schema annotations for API documentation and input validation.

classes.name: BookingCreateRequest
classes.description: A record that encapsulates data needed to create a new booking, including identifiers, types, reference codes, time ranges, monetary amount, currency, notes, and status.
